Unsurpassed simplicity, convenient accessibility, and no requirements for special tools are the hallmarks of our conventional on-load tap-changers. Hitachi Energy's customer-focused design philosophy has stood the test of time for more than 100 years and resulted in designs with fewer parts and lower maintenance costs. In addition to increased reliability, tap-changers with fewer parts allow for considerable reduction in size and cost.
Our conventional on-load tap-changers are matched with trustworthy, rugged motor drives that are configurable to meet a wide range of environmental conditions and customer specifications.
